name: 蒼葉
message: "...I've had it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "When are you brats gonna listen?!"

name: ミオ
message: "Waaaaahhhh!!!"
The terrible trio flees screaming from the shop.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Jeez."
I sigh and look around the store. Everything is a mess thanks to those stupid kids.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aw, man."
As usual, those three keep dropping in to cause trouble.

No matter how many times I yell at them, they always come back for more.

I guess you could say it's a sign that things are peaceful in the Old Residential District.
That doesn't make it any less annoying, though.

name: 凡人くん
message: "Cleaning... Cleaning..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hang on, I'll help you."
Taking pity on Junker, I kneel down and start cleaning up the mess.
I feel like I've done this before...
...That's right. That time I chased the kids out of the store and went outside to investigate that crash.
That was when I met Clear.
He'd fallen off the roof...
I wait, but no crash comes.
...Of course. I know better, but it still makes my heart ache.
I go back to cleaning, trying to distract myself.
Nothing stays the same forever. Things change, like it or not.
I need to move forward too.
